CriarTimeMensagem: Create your team to actively participate in championships!
NomeTimeMinimo: Team name must have at least 4 characters
NomeTimeMaximo: Team name must have a maximum of 100 characters
DescricaoMinimo: Description must have at least 10 characters
DescricaoMaximo: Description must have a maximum of 1000 characters
ModalTexto: To ensure the safety and integrity of your activities on our platform, we request your CPF (for individuals) or CNPJ (for companies). These data are collected solely for the purpose of maintaining a detailed history of our interactions, allowing us to have a clear reference in potential legal disputes or necessary clarifications. We guarantee that this information is stored securely and will not be used for any other purpose without your explicit consent. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your data.
ModalTextoUltimato: If you do not agree to the collection of your CPF or CNPJ, you will be redirected to the landing page.
CpfErroMensagem: There was a problem checking if he is eligible to use this feature. Try again later...
